bio: Hi, I'm the successful Optimism Collective
contributionDescription: I want to help whatever it is, I have a lot of experience in the RetroPGF field. The Optimism Collective’s third round of Retroactive Public Goods Funding (RetroPGF) will take place in fall of 2023. RetroPGF 3 will allocate 30m OP tokens to reward contributions that have supported the development and adoption of Optimism.
impactDescription: I want to help whatever it is, I have a lot of experience in the RetroPGF field. The Optimism Collective’s third round of Retroactive Public Goods Funding (RetroPGF) will take place in fall of 2023. RetroPGF 3 will allocate 30m OP tokens to reward contributions that have supported the development and adoption of Optimism.
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for violating the rules of promising future impact and potential deception. The individual's contribution and impact descriptions unpersuasively state a vague intent of future help without showing a clear past contribution or impact in the Web3 or blockchain space.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application is not correctly categorized. Although "applicantType" is mentioned as "INDIVIDUAL", the contribution and impact description are pertaining to a project "Optimism Collective", suggesting it should be categorized as a "PROJECT".
